sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A new ballad against bnthrifts [sic], Fulwood, William.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
At the long shop adioining vnto Saint mildreds Churche in the poultry, by Iohn Alde., Imprinted at London : [1562]
Signed: quoth. W.F. [i.e. William Fulwood]. Verse: "When raging louts with feble braines ..." Entered in Stationer's Register 1561-62. Cf. STC. Printed in two columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
A new ballad against bnthrifts [sic], Fulwood, William.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
At the long shop adioining vnto Saint mildreds Churche in the poultry, by Iohn Alde., Imprinted at London : [1562]
Signed: quoth. W.F. [i.e. William Fulwood]. Verse: "When raging louts with feble braines ..." Entered in Stationer's Register 1561-62. Cf. STC. Printed in two columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Iohn Alde.
the long shop adioining vnto Saint mildreds Churche in the poultry
